review: At first, I was overjoyed when I received my copy of this book.  However, when an enemy in my department showed me HER copy, I found that they were the OPPOSITE of random - they were IDENTICAL.It is very frustrating, let alone dangerous for my agents in the field; do not rely on this book for generating codes!Its list of deviates is very nice for someone in my profession, however.
productTitle: A Million Random Digits with 100,000 Normal Deviates
